name: Apple Pie - Apple cider and honey mead with spices (Bottle)
description: This sumptuous slice of Americana comes straight from the heartland. Our custom blend of locally-grown apples is the foundation of our Apple Pie. Crafting this cyser requires balancing the cold-pressed apple cider with the perfect combination of rich spices and honey to deliver the great American dessert, Apple Pie, to your glass!

name: Hopped Ohio - Mead Dry Hopped with variety of hops (Bottle)
description: Traditional mead dry hopped with Citra, Simcoe, Cascade and Chinook hops. Sweet and bitter. Pine and citrus flavors. Semi-Dry.

name: Rockmill Brewery
description: Le Cheval farmhouse ale. Moins Est Plus.

name: Le Boucher - Saison/ Farmhouse Ale
description: Collaboration brew with Butcher and the Brewer. Farmhouse IPA featuring Chinook, Citra, Topaz, Centennial, and Mandarina hops.

name: Select Ohio Meads to be announced
Strawberry Rose
description: A blend of Pinot Grigio and Riesling which each come from our own vineyards. Natural strawberry flavoring is added to give this wine a fruity and refreshing taste with strawberry preserves lingering in the finish.

name: Ohio River Valley Niagara
description: Fresh fruit, clean finish, distinctive flavors and a bouquet of butterscotch come through with this American varietal. Just like fresh grapes off the vine.

name: Blueberry Noir
description: Just as its name portrays, a blend of three exceptional red vinfera grapes with natural blueberry flavoring. This wine brings back memories of homemade blueberry pie that Grandma used to make.

name: Nut Brown Ale
description: Mahogany In Color Entering With Hints Of Maple Followed By A Roasted Hazelnut Flavor Balancing A Clean Malty Finish

name: Snapshot Series Imperial IPA
description: Snapshot Series Session Eight: Imperial IPA.

name: Peanut Butter Brown Ale
description: Nut Brown Ale brewed with peanut butter and banana.

name: Razz Wheat
description: 40% white wheat and 60% malted two row create a nice subtle wheat ale. 420lbs of all natural raspberry puree is added during fermentation giving this beer a unique and playful personality. The rosy haze and sticky head embody a continuum of sour sweetness held together by a wheat back bone.

name: Mystic Mama - IPA
description:
This is that big sticky hop elixir that I have always wanted to brew. Columbus and Warrior hops lend an assertive bitterness. Amarillo, Simcoe, and Centennial hops give this beer tons of great flavors of grapefruit, tangerines, and pine needles. A big dry hop addition of Amarillo and Simcoe give Mystic Mama a nose to stand up to the flavor. Soon to be a year round addition.\
\
A west coast styled IPA that uses 5 different hops (Centennial, Amarillo, Warrior, Simcoe, Columbus) giving it tons of flavor, aroma, and an assertive bitterness. 7% abv with the ability to get you hop trigger firing!

name: Chomolungma - Honey Nut Brown Ale
description: This brown ale was brewed to commemorate the Lungevity Everest Expedition. Brian Oestrike the brother of Jackie O’s owner Art, sumitted the unforgiving mountain on May 22nd, 2007. The climb was a vehicle to raise money and awareness about lung cancer. The people of Tibet call Mt. Everest “Chomolungma” this exceptional ale carries on the spirit of the climb. 8 Malts, 2 hops, and twenty pounds of wild flower honey give this ale an exceptional character. Baked muffins, dark fruit, bittersweet chocolate, rich honey and earthy subtle hops caress the palate. Booze soaked chocolate raisins round out the warm finish. Now available in cans.

name: Lake Erie Monster - Imperial IPA
description: An Imperial IPA with huge hop flavor.

name: Burning River - Pale Ale
description: An assertively hopped American Pale Ale with citrusy and piney Cascade hops. Subtle malt flavors balance the hop profile and provide a satisfying dry finish.

name: Bumble Berry - Honey Blueberry Ale
description: Honey Blueberry Wheat. Brewed with fresh harvested spring honey stolen from some very angry bees (we have the welts to prove it) and infused with fresh blueberries. Creating a light, refreshing ale with a nice blueberry aroma, crackery malt flavors, a hint of sweetness and a refreshing blueberry finish. Get yo buzz on!

name: Big Vic - Imperial IPA
description: Our Brewmaster, Vic, is a man of few words. He lets his award-winning beers do the talking, and this one has a lot to say. Big Vic features a rich, subtle, hazy amber color, with vibrant hop-driven aromas and flavors of grapefruit, pineapple, peach and pine. With a medium-to-full body, it’s dry-hopped with Citra to create a bold, hoppy wheat IPA hybrid that works. Knock one back for Vic.

name: Old Leghumper - Robust Porter
description: A robust porter, dark brown in color and full-bodied with a malty sweet taste. Deep roasted, yet silky-smooth! Two types of roasted malts, including deep-roasted chocolate malt are used to give this porter a rich, chocolately taste.

name: Coffee Brown Ale
description: A collaborative beer from the brewers of MCMC and the roasters of Cincinnati’s Deeper Roots Coffee.

name: Crystal Gold - Light Lager
description: Our light beer weighs in at 103 calories/12 oz, and is hand crafted with all natural ingredients. Affectionately named for a PBC brew from the early 1900’s, this light beer reflects the goodness of the sun from the grain to your glass!

name: Tenpenny Amber Ale
description: Our house Amber Ale, Tenpenny Ale balances sweet, caramel malt with a mildly bitter, fragrant hop nose. Underneath those flavors lurks a powerhouse yeast that contributes the classic ale ester profile rather than the too clean flavors in modern beer. Tenpenny Ale is unpasteurized and never filtered, it’s beer the way it was intended to be.

name: Kilt em All - Scottish Ale
description: An intense Scottish Ale with complex roasted and toffee flavors.

name: OTR - Over the Rhine Ale
description: Cincinnati-based Christian Moerlein Brewing Co. will introduce its latest brand extension - Moerlein Over-the-Rhine Ale - on April 25, 2007. Moerlein OTR Ale was initially going to be called Moerlein Pale Ale, but Hardman said he decided to name it OTR Ale instead, in part as a tribute to the many people who are working to revitalize the long-neglected community just north of Cincinnati’s central business district. The beer is of the type that early brewers in Over-the-Rhine would have made in the era before modern refrigeration, he said. The recipe includes plenty of hops, which acted as a preservative, and lots of malt to balance the bitterness of the hops.

name: Gangster Frog - IPA
description: Crisp & satisfying American IPA with an assertive, refreshing hop aroma & flavor. Bright, spicy citrus hop character is up front, with a distinct orange & tropical fruit hop bouquet to add a welcome complexity & strike the perfect balance. Its all about the hops with Gangster Frog IPA!

name: White Rajah - IPA
description: A West Coast style IPA full of citrus-like and tropical fruit-like hop flavor and aroma with an assertive yet smooth bitter finish. .....malt, take a back seat please.

name: PsycHopathy - IPA
description: The subtle malt backbone combats the bitterness and intensity of floral, grassy, and citrus hop flavors. However, taste is perception. What’s your slant?

name: Headhunter - IPA
description: No other ingredient stirs the passion of a Master Brewer like the hop. Inspired by this legendary flower we challenged ourselves to create a world class IPA. Head Hunter is an aggressively dry-hopped, West Coast-Style IPA with a huge hop display of pine, grapefruit, citrus and pineapple. A punch-you-in-the-mouth brew for those who truly love their hops! Uncivilized? Yes. Aggressive? Absolutely. Award Winning? Hell yes!

name: Moonshadow IPA
description: Our award winning American IPA, Moonshadow has a deep gold/orange hue and features a large dose of American hops for both bittering, flavor and aroma. We then dry-hop it in the fermenter to add even more hop aroma and flavor. The result is a balanced beer with crisp bitterness and a mouthful of hops that finish with flavors of citrus and grapefruit. At 7.6%, it also packs a bit of a punch. Try it with spicy foods like our famous Buffalo Chicken Pizza.

name: Apple Pie
description: Our award winning American IPA, Moonshadow has a deep gold/orange hue and features a large dose of American hops for both bittering, flavor and aroma. We then dry-hop it in the fermenter to add even more hop aroma and flavor. The result is a balanced beer with crisp bitterness and a mouthful of hops that finish with flavors of citrus and grapefruit. At 7.6%, it also packs a bit of a punch. Try it with spicy foods like our famous Buffalo Chicken Pizza.

name: Peach Rush
description: Amazing summer mead with hints of peach

name: Hopped Ohio
description: Traditional mead dry hopped with Citra, Simcoe, Cascade and Chinook hops. Sweet and bitter. Pine and citrus flavors. Semi-Dry.

name: Le Cheval
description: Le Cheval farmhouse ale. Moins Est Plus.

name: Le Boucher
description: Collaboration brew with Butcher and the Brewer. Farmhouse IPA featuring Chinook, Citra, Topaz, Centennial, and Mandarina hops.

name: Bear Ass - Pale Ale
description: There's no better way to hang out with your friends, even if one of them is an Ass, than by cracking open a can of fresh, never light-struck Bear Ass Pale Ale. This American style Pale Ale is an attractive golden straw color with citus aromas and a hoppy presence that compliments the supple bready malt flavors. Leaves a pleasant, clean finish.

name: Dirty Dick's - Nut Brown
description: Dirty Dick's is a smooth brown ale with aromas of roasted malt and plenty of nuttiness.  Hints of stone fruit and a slight bitterness mean easy drinkability.  Low hopping rates make the beer more chocolatey, malty, and sweet. Light fruity notes give a dates and figs note late in the finish and as the beer warms.

name: Heiferweizen - Heifeweizen
description: Just because people call us a Cowtown doesn't mean we don't know what the hell a good beer tastes like. Our Heiferweizen is named after Maudine, the 1926 OSU Homecoming Queen. Be cool this summer sipping this refreshing German style wheat beer with a stimulating burst of clove and banana essence from our heiferweizen yeast in this unfiltered style.

name: Divergent - Berliner Weisse
description: Flappers have always been a symbol of change and rebellion, harkening to a time where challenging the norm was all the rage. This beer embraces and celebrates that vibrant, relentless spirit. Representing the rebirth of a brewery and the reclamation of a dream, this beer is a completely contradictory experience where the wort is soured, the hops are minimized and the beer is filtered to be brilliant. Crisp, delicate, cutting edge, complex and tart, pouring a bright citrine with a nose of gently soured rind fruit, this beer is exactly what is needed when looking for a little something…Divergent.

name: Blueberry Lager - Blueberry lager
description: Juicy, crisp, clean and invigorating, this American Fruit Beer pours a brilliant golden hue as bright as the summer sun. With a sweet, malt-tinged, fruity aroma, our Blueberry Lager strikes a refreshing balance between its’ American 2 Row malt base and vivid Blueberry flavor resulting in a beer that is the perfect pour for the long, lazy, hazy days of Summer.

name: Barley's Blood Thirst Wheat - Wheat Beer with Blood Oranges
description: Winner of our 14th annual Homebrew Competition in 2009. Lloyd Cicetti's Wheat Beer with Blood Oranges is a citrusy and supremely refreshing with floral notes thanks to Sicillian blood orange zest added to the brew kettle and puree added during and after fermentation. This hefeweizen has hints of fruity esters and spice from Bavarian wheat yeast.

name: Barley's Citrajectory Saison - Farmhouse Ale
description: This single hop, multi grain Farmhouse Ale is designed for summer drinking. Soft grain presence and a subdued hop bitterness are the background to juicy citrus fruit/hop flavor and a peppery spice from Belgian yeast. Citrajectory is equally well suited for the field, the pool, or the table.

name: PsycHOPathy - IPA
description:
Wednesday night only.\
\
The subtle malt backbone combats the bitterness and intensity of floral, grassy, and citrus hop flavors. However, taste is perception. What’s your slant?

name: Gnarly Brown - American Brown Ale
description:
Wednesday night only.\
\
Specialty malts bring intimations of brown sugar and vanilla, which meld into the Gnarly’s character. Roasted coffee malt flavors and residual sweetness dance in harmony, obscuring the line between brown ale and porter.

name: Sunshine Daydream - Session IPA
description:
Wednesday night only\
\
Our hoppy, refreshing session drinker. This bright golden colored brew offers aromas of tropical fruit and pine, along with a juicy citrusy blast on your palate. Finishes with a lingering dry bitterness. Peace, Love and Hoppiness.

name: Bumbleberry - Honey blueberry ale
description:
Wednesday night only.\
\
Honey Blueberry Wheat. Brewed with fresh harvested spring honey stolen from some very angry bees (we have the welts to prove it) and infused with fresh blueberries. Creating a light, refreshing ale with a nice blueberry aroma, crackery malt flavors, a hint of sweetness and a refreshing blueberry finish. Get yo buzz on!

name: Mystic Mama - IPA
description:
Wednesday night only.\
\
A west coast styled IPA that uses 5 different hops (Centennial, Amarillo, Warrior, Simcoe, Columbus) giving it tons of flavor, aroma, and an assertive bitterness. 7% abv with the ability to get you hop trigger firing!

name: Ricky - Blonde Ale
description:
Wednesday night only. \
\
Our yellow beer, brewed the hard way! Ricky was specifically designed for warm weather drinking and festivals. This beer was the first test batch and we wanted to create something that was very light, clean, crisp, and refreshing. Crafted with only 2-row barley, dextrose sugar, and saaz hops.

name: Galactic Heroes - IPA
description: To honor one of our favorite bands operating in one of our favorite genres of music we created the happiest beer we could imagine. Erupting with West Coast IPA notes of grapefruit, juicy orange and lemon, this towering beer lays it down thick and heavy without being a palate wrecker. With a subtle balance of sweet and alcohol to balance out all the hop notes it’ll put a big old smile on everyone’s face.

name: White Rajah - IPA
description: A West Coast style IPA full of citrus-like and tropical fruit-like hop flavor and aroma with an assertive yet smooth bitter finish. .....malt, take a back seat please.

name: Summer Rays - Belgian style unfiltered wheat ale
description: Our take on a Belgian style unfiltered wheat ale brewed with raw wheat and flaked oats and spiced with coriander and orange & lemon peel.

name: 4Cs - IPA with Cascade, Centennial, Columbus and Chinook hops
description: Cascade, Centennial, Columbus and Chinook hops create abundant aromas, flavors that give this beer its name.

name: Lupolo Libre - Gold medal award winning double IPA
Big Woody Lager - Munich style lager
description: A classic Munich style lager. Crisp and refreshing, brewed with all German malts and hops!

name: Special release: beer aged in bourbon barrels
description: Special release of Brew Kettle beer aged in bourbon barrels, beers TBA

name: Blackberry Wit - A Belgian Wit with blackberrys
Bed Head Red - Irish Red Ale
description: Complex ale with caramel and hints of roasted malt.

name: White Water Witte - Witbier
description: A refreshing Belgian wheat ale with a zesty citrus body full of fruity flavors and a slight pepper finish

name: Blonde Ale - Blonde Ale
description: Hand crafted beer light in color entering smooth with a clean and flavorful body finishing with a lightly fruity taste.

name: Coffee Brown Ale - Brown Ale
description: A collaborative beer from the brewers of MCMC and the roasters of Cincinnati’s Deeper Roots Coffee.

name: Summer Wheat - Summertime Ale
description: Bright, citrusy, & hoppy, this summertime ale salutes the flavor of the American hop & gives way to a smooth refreshing finish.

name: Ginger Verve - Wildflower mead infused with vanilla and ginger, lavender and chamomile
Peach Rush - Summer peaches with wildflower honey
Rye of Jupiter - Rye IPA
description: Rye India Pale Ale created for International Space University 2015.

name: Kinda Fuzzy - Peach and Apricot Wheat Ale
Hibernator - Imperial Buckwheat Brown Ale (on nitro)
Green Flowers
brewery: Jackie O's Brewery collaboration with Yellow Springs Brewery

name: Guava Lamp - Tropical Session IPA
brewery: Jackie O's Brewery collaboration with Fat Head's Brewery

name: Sparbock - Doppelbock
description: Available beginning Monday, July 13. Join us for the keg-tapping at 5pm.

name: Keypunch - Key Lime Gose
description: Harrow Gose with key lime zest and key lime juice added to give it a tropical punch and a refreshing kick for an all around great summer beer!

name: Fat Julian - Imperial Stout
description:
This bittersweet Imperial Stout is reminiscent of leathery elephants dipped in dark chocolate. \
\
It barely fits in your mouth.\
\
Here's to big, delicious challenges.

name: Photon  - American Light Lager
description:
This dazzling light beer has a dual nature: A wave of malty golden flavor with very little mass.\
\
A challenge to brew but a cinch to drink. This beer moves at precisely the speed of itself.

name: Conductor - Imperial Rye IPA
description:
This harmonious Imperial IPA is composed with precision and rye.\
\
Malts make early overtures. Experimental hops arrive on time, conveying an elegant bitterness that promptly departs again.

name: Brass Punk Pils - German style pilsner
One Rye'd - Rye Pale Ale
description: Rotating tap handle, subject to availability

name: 1862 Ale - American Kolsh
description: Rotating tap handle, subject to availability

name: Pirogue - Belgian Style Black Tripel w/ Coffee
description: Rotating tap handle, subject to availability

name: Barn Gang - Belgian Saison
description: Rotating tap handle, subject to availability

name: Chomolungma - Honey Nut Brown Ale
description: This brown ale was brewed to commemorate the Lungevity Everest Expedition. Brian Oestrike the brother of Jackie O’s owner Art, sumitted the unforgiving mountain on May 22nd, 2007. The climb was a vehicle to raise money and awareness about lung cancer. The people of Tibet call Mt. Everest “Chomolungma” this exceptional ale carries on the spirit of the climb. 8 Malts, 2 hops, and twenty pounds of wild flower honey give this ale an exceptional character. Baked muffins, dark fruit, bittersweet chocolate, rich honey and earthy subtle hops caress the palate. Booze soaked chocolate raisins round out the warm finish. Now available in cans.

name: Bourbon Barrel Brick Kiln - Barrel-aged English Style Barleywine
Liquid Courage - American Style Barleywine
brewery: Jackie O's Brewery collaboration with Fat Head's Brewery

name: Wood Ya Honey - Wheat Wine Style Ale, Aged in Bourbon Barrels
Green Flowers - Pale Ale
brewery: Jackie O's Brewery collaboration with Yellow Springs Brewery

name: New Growth
description: IPA brewed with Blue Spruce tips

name: Apt. 223 - Black double IPA
brewery: Jackie O's Brewery collaboration with The Answer Brewery in Richmond, VA
description: Black Double India Pale Ale & collaboration with The Answer Brewery in Richmond, VA.

name: Guava Lamp
brewery: Jackie O's Brewery collaboration with Fat Head's Brewery

name: Pappy barrel aged Chickow! - Barrel aged hazelnut double brown ale
Don't Talk Sh*t about Norwood - Pale Ale
Bourbon Barrel Aged Shamrock Shake - Barrel aged Irish cream stout
MadMann - Cranberry Gose
brewery: Listermann Brewing Co. collaboration with MadTree Brewing

name: Boysen the Hood - Belgian Wit with Boysenberries
Dreamsicle - Kolsch with orange and vanilla
Bourbon Barrel-Aged Happy Amber - Barrel aged amber ale
Bottle: Dark Apparition - Russian Imperial Stout
Bottle: Bourbon Barrel Dark Apparition - Barrel-Aged Russian Imperial Stout
Bottle: Brick Kiln 2014 - English Style Barleywine
Bottle: Brick Kiln 2015 - English Style Barleywine
Bottle: Bourbon Barrel Brick Kiln - Barrel-Aged English Style Barleywine
Bottle: Paw Paw Wheat - Imperial Wheat Ale brewed with Paw Paw fruit
Bottle: Bourbon Barrel Paw Paw Wheat - Barrel-Aged Imperial Wheat Ale brewed with Paw Paw fruit
Bottle: Oil of Aphrodite - American Double Stout brewed with Black Walnuts
Bottle: Bourbon Barrel Oil of Aphrodite - Barrel-Aged American Double Stout brewed w/Black Walnuts
Bottle: Wood Ya Honey - Barrel-Aged Wheat Wine Style Ale brewed with honey
Cans: Sol Drifter - Blonde ale w/strawberries
Saison du Poisson - Farmhouse ale brewed with organic Ohio spelt
House IPA - American IPA with organic barley
description:
Rotating-hop I.P.A.\
Our first batch uses Equinox, Falconer's Flight and Centennial.

name: Reinheitsgewhat?! - Berline Weisse-Gruit
description: A sour, hopless, wheat  ale with citrus zest, reships and chamomile.

name: Lil' Harvey's Milk Stout - Milk stout
description: A rich stout brewed with lactose sugar and served on nitrogen. Named after our son and his love of Mama's milk!

name: Ridge Runner Coffee Milk Stout
description: Lil Harvey's with locally roasted organic coffee

name: Delta Dry-Hopped Saison du Poisson - Dry hopped farmhouse ale brewed with Ohio spelt
Rugrat Ginger Ale
description: Non-alcoholic homemade ginger ale.  Fresh ginger and organic raw cane sugar.

name: Double Couple Three Hops Imperial IPA - Imperial/Double IPA
Seiche Scottish Ale - Strong Scottish Ale
Finn
description: Hops lead this Berliner Weisse variant. A hoppy nose of lemon, grapefruit, and citrus is accompanied by bursting hop flavor and a light malt backbone.

name: Harrow
description:
Straw with a pillowy head from a deep German heritage. A bready fragrance with fruity esters compliment flavors of biscuit, salt, and tartness to end refreshing.\
\
Story: This gose is reminiscent of a simpler time, when a harrow was horse drawn, prepping the fields for the very wheat that give this beer its distinct flavor.

name: Smoke N/ Burn - Porter
brewery: Fat Head's Brewery collaboration with Founders Brewing Co.

name: Boysen the Hood - Belgian Pale Ale
Green Flowers - Pale Ale
brewery: Jackie O's Brewery collaboration with Yellow Springs Brewery

name: Apple Pie - Apple cider and honey mead with spices
Hopped Raspberry - Dry hopped raspberry mead
Cans: Razz Wheat - Raspberry Wheat Ale
Cans: Gnarly Brown Ale - Brown ale
Rock N Roast - OBW Exclusive Session IPA
Midnight Sun Black IPA - Black IPA
Glass City Glory - American Pale Wheat Ale
Select Ohio Meads to be Announced
Strawberry Rose
description: Grape Wine with Natural Strawberry Flavor

name: Blueberry Noir
description: Grape Wine with Natural Blueberry Flavor

name: Chomolungma - Honey Nut Brown Ale
description: This brown ale was brewed to commemorate the Lungevity Everest Expedition. Brian Oestrike the brother of Jackie O’s owner Art, sumitted the unforgiving mountain on May 22nd, 2007. The climb was a vehicle to raise money and awareness about lung cancer. The people of Tibet call Mt. Everest “Chomolungma” this exceptional ale carries on the spirit of the climb. 8 Malts, 2 hops, and twenty pounds of wild flower honey give this ale an exceptional character. Baked muffins, dark fruit, bittersweet chocolate, rich honey and earthy subtle hops caress the palate. Booze soaked chocolate raisins round out the warm finish. Now available in cans.

name: Coffee Brown Ale
description: Brown Ale Brewed with Deeper Roots Coffee

name: 12 Dogs of Christmas Ale
description: Ale Brewed with Honey and Spice

name: Barrel Aged Siberian Night
description: Bourbon Barrel Aged Russian Imperial Stout

name: Sol Drifter
description: Golden Ale. Available only on Friday 7/15

name: Cardinal Ale
description: Irish Red (Cardinal Ale to be replaced by Buckeye Blonde when it runs out)

name: Clothesline
description: Saison/Rye Farmhouse Ale - A refreshingly funk farmhouse with rye character

name: Coffee Kodiak
description: The same base beer as our Kodiak, but punched up a notch with the addition of Deeper Roots coffee out of Mt. Healthy, Cincinnati, OH. Coffee highlights this beers already coffee like malt flavors to really bring home a delicious coffee flavor reminiscent of a delicious cup of pour-over.

name: Kilt em All Scotish Ale
description: An intense Scottish Ale with complex roasted and toffee flavors.

name: Bed Head Red
description: Complex ale with caramel and hints of roasted malt.

name: Over-The-Rhine Ale
description: Cincinnati-based Christian Moerlein Brewing Co. will introduce its latest brand extension - Moerlein Over-the-Rhine Ale - on April 25, 2007. Moerlein OTR Ale was initially going to be called Moerlein Pale Ale, but Hardman said he decided to name it OTR Ale instead, in part as a tribute to the many people who are working to revitalize the long-neglected community just north of Cincinnati’s central business district. The beer is of the type that early brewers in Over-the-Rhine would have made in the era before modern refrigeration, he said. The recipe includes plenty of hops, which acted as a preservative, and lots of malt to balance the bitterness of the hops.

name: Crystal Gold Light Lager
description: Our light beer weighs in at 103 calories/12 oz, and is hand crafted with all natural ingredients. Affectionately named for a PBC brew from the early 1900’s, this light beer reflects the goodness of the sun from the grain to your glass!

name: Mound Builder's Brown Ale
description: Our brown ale is made exclusively with American ingredients and enlists mounds of malt to build a beer that is rich with flavor!

name: The Lemon Blues
description: A lemon shandy cider infused with fresh lemons and finished with Ohio honey and a sprinkle of brown sugar. Enjoy chilled or over ice in the hot summer months while listening to your favorite Blues! The Lemon Blues™ takes its name from our brewers’ childhood summers of attending The Blues concerts in Gloucestershire, England.

name: Buckeye Blonde
description: An extremely drinkable Belgian wheat ale with subtle, spicy finish wheat is very refreshing and will take you back to the cafes of Brussels.

name: Eccentricity
description:
This unusual French Ale plots a bold trajectory.\
\
Its quirky character revolves around a distinctive Biere de Garde yeast and the subtle burn of fresh ginger and black pepper.\
\
We hope it pulls your mouth into our peculiar orbit.

name: Temporal
description:
This timeless Abbey ale remembers a thousand years of Belgian brewing tradition.\
\
An infinite devotion to time and temperature connects brewers of the past and present.

name: Bourbon Barrel Aged Peach Rush
description: Barrel Aged Summer Peach Mead with Wildflower Honey.

name: Apple Pie
description: This sumptuous slice of Americana comes straight from the heartland. Our custom blend of locally-grown apples is the foundation of our Apple Pie. Crafting this cyser requires balancing the cold-pressed apple cider with the perfect combination of rich spices and honey to deliver the great American dessert, Apple Pie, to your glass!

name: Unglued Carmel Apple
description: Hard cider made from fresh pressed apples.

name: Hop Smash IPA
description: This West Coast Style IPA is an aggressively hopped beer! An abundance of hope are combined throughout the brewing process to bring out different characteristics. Columbus, Amarillo, Citra, Warrior, Centennial & Chinook team up to give your tongue a good smashing.

name: Smoked Porter
description: Light smoke and dark roasted malts combined with crystal and mosaic hops to round out this easy drinking porter.

name: East/West Barrel Ahed Cider
description: Hybrid French and American Oak barrels aged with Cabernet Sauvignon for 8 years, Russian Imperial Stout for 6 months then our house dry cider for 9 months.

name: East/West Mead
description:
Hybrid French and American Oak barrels aged\
with Cabernet Sauvignon for 8 years, Russian\
Imperial Stout for 6 months then our house dry\
cider for 9 months.

name: Sunshine Daydream Session IPA
description: Our hoppy, refreshing session drinker. This bright golden colored brew offers aromas of tropical fruit and pine, along with a juicy citrusy blast on your palate. Finishes with a lingering dry bitterness. Peace, Love and Hoppiness.

name: Head Hunter IPA
description: Uncivilized and aggressive this west coast styled IPA packs wicked hop flavors and aroma. Savage amounts of Simcoe, Columbus, and Cascade hops define this brews signature pine and citrus notes. Try with our smoked wings in the Killer sauce and run the risk of a shrunken head!

name: Trail Head Pale Ale
description: An aggressive Pale Ale brewed with Simcoe & Citra hops. Brewed to support the Cleveland Metroparks. 50 cents from every pint and $1 from every growler will go directly to the Metroparks.

name: Jack Straw Pilsner
description:
We’ll bet the farm that this easy drinking pilsner will beckon to you on a hot, dry, summer day. Jack Straw is a down-to-earth Pils with a grainy sweetness, medium hop bitterness, and country straw color.\
\
Bohemian and Bavarian Pilsners collide to create a crisp Pilsner brewed with Czech floor malted barley tenuously hopped with German Magnum, Tettnang and Saffir hops.

name: Midnight Moonlight
description: Dank, resinous, and citrusy hops flex their muscles while an aggressive, palate-scraping bitterness rips through your mouth. Toasty caramel malt flavors and a dash of chocolate malt round this one out.

name: Jungle Juiced Head Hunter
description: Head Hunter with oranges and orange zest.

name: Bumble Berry Honey Blueberry Ale
description: Honey Blueberry Wheat. Brewed with fresh harvested spring honey stolen from some very angry bees (we have the welts to prove it) and infused with fresh blueberries. Creating a light, refreshing ale with a nice blueberry aroma, crackery malt flavors, a hint of sweetness and a refreshing blueberry finish. Get yo buzz on!

name: Rally Drum Red Ale
description: Rally Drum Red Ale is an American Red Ale, a modern non-traditional style borrowing heavily from characteristics associated with more classical styles such as “pale ales” or “bitters.” This unfiltered copper-colored ale is brewed with a blend of Harrington 2-Row Base Malt, Crystal 77, and Special Roast malts, yielding a toasty layered complexity. Cascade and Simcoe hops add bitterness and aroma.

name: High Striker Single
description: Inspired by the North Coast’s theme marks, classic midway games, and Belgium’s carnival tradition, High Striker Single is a vibrant Belgian-style golden stricken with spicy, earthy hops and a touch of wheat. Give High Striker a swing (or a swig). Every sip is a winner!

name: Sharpshooter Session Wheat IPA
description: Inspired by Ohio’s Annie Oakley, our Session Wheat IPA is peppered with rounds of whole orange peel and fully loaded with Jarrylo hops.

name: Lake Erie Monster Double IPA
description: An Imperial IPA with huge hop flavor.

name: Lawn Seat K��h
description: Brewed with spicy Mt. Hood hops, Lawn Seat K��h is a flavorful German-style ale inspired by outdoor concert season and the idea that the best seats in the house aren’t always under a roof. Al fresco shows should be enjoyed with a fresh beer in one hand, a clear sky above, and good music and friends all around.

name: Alberta Clipper
description: A Winter Porter made with Belgian Chocolate and Raspberries.

name: Holy Moses White Ale
description: A complex and heavily aromatic ale with fruit, spice and other floral characteristics. Brewed with unmalted wheat and oats.

name: Abby Avenue Dubbel
description: A Belgian style ale with dark malty flavor and hints of fruit.

name: Chillwave Double IPA
description: Hop-forward with a balanced blend of Mosaic and Nugget hops.

name: Christmas Ale
description: It has a cinnamon and ginger spice flavor, a rich copper color, and a medium body that will fit with any holiday meal.

name: Dortmunder Gold
description: This smooth lager strikes a delicate balance between malt and hops in the aroma, palate, finish and body. It has more body and less hops than a Pilsner, and less malt and more hops than a Munich style lager.

name: Eliot Ness
description: Deep Amber red color, with a fragrant malt aroma. Flavorful notes of rich caramelized malt and noble hop flavors harmonize on the palate leading to a crisp clean finish. Named after one of Cleveland’s most respected safety directors, who frequented the brewpub’s bar during his tenure from 1935-1941 and, according to popular legend, was responsible for the bullet holes still evident today.

name: Edmund Fitzgerald Porter
description: Complex, roasty aroma with a bittersweet, chocolate-coffee taste and a bold hop presence.

name: Thunderbird Hop Harvest IPA
description: Being in the heart of it all, we are often left out from the bounty of hop harvest season experienced on the west coast. We joined forces with a local farmer - Tony Sallee, the owner of Sallee Farms - to secure some purely Ohio-grown Columbus, Centennial, and Cascade Hops. Tony is an amazing guy who raises organic poultry and who we affectionately call T-bird. Thank you for the bounty of this harvest, Tony.

name: Barbarossa Double Dark Lager
description: Moerlein Barbarossa is slow-aged with a deep reddish brown color and a malt aroma derived from Munich dark malt. The balanced finish invites a toast to the return of a legend.

name: Altered Pale Ale
description: Originating in a home brew recipe from Moerlein’s Brewers Rian Umbach and Al Sheets, Altered Wheat is an aggressively hopped American Wheat. Powering this up is the excessive use of Centennial, Sorachi Ace, and Pacific Jade hops for a huge citrus character.

name: PsychOpathy
description: IPA. The subtle malt backbone combats the bitterness and intensity of floral, grassy, and citrus hop flavors. However, taste is perception. What’s your slant?

name: Gnarly Brown
description: Specialty malts bring intimations of brown sugar and vanilla, which meld into the Gnarly’s character. Roasted coffee malt flavors and residual sweetness dance in harmony, obscuring the line between brown ale and porter.
